Article Title: 'End of my career', 'biometrics done, what to do now': Panic spreads as US defers H-1B visa appointments in India
Article Text:
'Stuck in India, end of my career'

'Canceled right after I completed biometrics today'





Visa applicants in India Tuesday received messages that their appointment at the consular office this week has been rescheduled . The rescheduled dates are mostly in March 2026 as the immigration office buys time for social media vetting of applicants -- the new rule that kicks in from December 15, 2025 where all social media accounts of applicants will be scrutinized to check if the individual made any negative posts about the US.Panic spread as the US Embassy in India also confirmed that appointment dates are being rescheduled. "If you have received an email advising that your visa appointment has been rescheduled, Mission India looks forward to assisting you on your new appointment date. Arriving on your previously scheduled appointment date will result in your being denied admittance to the Consulate," the message said.Social media users said the clarification from the embassy was vague as applicants are left in a lurch, as they don't know what to do until March, and whether their companies in the US will allow them to remain in India till March.A Redditor said the appointment rescheduling will end the career as the US employer would not allow to work remotely. "I am stuck in India, have biometrics this week. I used all my leaves to come for stamping. My employer cannot allow me to work remotely. This is the end of my career, worked so hard to get a job and build my life so far, everything is gone with one single decision. I dont know what to do since it is moved to May 2025, and I will certainly lose my job.This is the end of all my hardwork and dreams," the person wrote.One user said the visa appointment in Chennai consulated scheduled on December 18 got canceled right after their biometrics Tuesday. "This is new uncharted territory for everyone. I think you and everyone else should reach out to your employer and their immigration firms, solicit their advice and come back to this group with the advice provided by the lawyers. Only after a good sample set of advice received from various employers and lawyers, will we able to make sense of what the next steps can be," one wrote. Some applicants said they came to India for that appointment and now they don't know what to do as they can't stay in India until their rescheduled date in 2026.
Article Summary: Visa applicants in india received messages that their appointment at the consular office this week has been rescheduled. Rescheduled dates are mostly in march 2026 as the immigration office buys time for social media vetting of applicants.

Article Title: Isro to launch its heaviest US commercial sat BlueBird-6 on December 15
Article Text:
ISRO Makes History As ‚ÄòBahubali‚Äô Rocket Places India‚Äôs Heaviest Communication Satellite In Orbit

NEW DELHI: In a boost to Indo-US space cooperation, Isro will launch its heaviest American commercial communication low-earth orbit satellite, the 6.5-tonne BlueBird-6, from the Sriharikota spaceport on Dec 15. Isro‚Äôs ‚ÄòBahubali‚Äô rocket LVM3 will put the US satellite into orbit.AST SpaceMobile, a Texas-based company that has built the space-based cellular broadband network, said, ‚ÄúBlueBird-6, a US licensed satellite, is scheduled to launch on Dec 15. It is the first of AST SpaceMobile‚Äôs next-generation satellites. When launched, it will feature the largest commercial phased array in low earth orbit at nearly 2,400 sqft. This represents 3.5 times increase in size over BlueBirds 1-5 and supports ten times the data capacity. ‚ÄùBlueBird-6 is a ‚ÄúBlock-2‚Äù satellite and part of a larger plan by AST SpaceMobile to deploy a series of satellites to achieve non-continuous service, with further launches scheduled through 2026. Its aim is to bridge the ‚Äúdigital divide‚Äù by offering fast, unhindered direct-to-device mobile broadband service in areas with poor or non-existent terrestrial network coverage.The BlueBird satellites are designed to deliver a high amount of bandwidth, with each unit capable of up to 10,000 MHz. They operate by partnering with existing mobile network carriers to enhance their networks using licensed spectrum.The BlueBird-6 satellite arrived in India from the US on Oct 19. It was later transported by road to Sriharikota for integration with launcher LVM3, fuelling and final checks ahead of its launch.The liftoff is being handled by New Space India Limited (NSIL), Isro‚Äôs commercial wing. LVM-3 had recently put India‚Äôs heaviest CMS-3 satellite, weighing 4.4 tonnes, into its orbit on Nov 2. A three-stage launch vehicle, LVM3 rocket can carry payloads weighing up to 8,000 kg to low-Earth orbit (LEO) and 4,000 kg to geosynchronous transfer orbit (GTO). The human-rated version of this vehicle will fly three Indian astronauts to space, as part of the Gaganyaan mission, which is planned for 2027.
Article Summary: Isro will launch its heaviest american commercial communication low-earth orbit satellite, the 6.5-tonne bluebird-6, from sriharikota spaceport on dec 15. Isro‚Äôs ‚Äòbahubali‚Äô rocket lvm3 will put the us satellite into orbit.

Article Title: Sovereign control a valid concern: Satya Nadella
Article Text:
Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella announced a significant $17.5 billion investment in India over four years, focusing on AI and cloud. He acknowledged India's need for sovereign control and local resilience in technology deployment. Nadella lauded India's unique "virtuous cycle" of policies, digital infrastructure, and market, highlighting the launch of Sovereign Public Cloud for enhanced governance and control.

NEW DELHI; As Microsoft invests $17.5 billion in India over the next four years into AI and cloud, the tech giant's CEO Satya Nadella Wednesday said it was a "legitimate concern" of countries like India to talk about sovereign control and local resilience.Asked whether AI and tech prowess were increasingly being used as diplomacy tools and nations needed to build resilience and sovereign stack, Nadella said, "... it's absolutely a very legitimate question and concern... and I would say a requirement. Which is for a country like India to say that ultimately things that are being deployed here, used here, at scale are effectively resilient and sovereign. In other words, you want to control your own destiny. "Reaffirming the tech giant's commitment to India's AI ambitions, the India-born CEO - delivering his keynote at the Microsoft Leadership Connection event - praised what he called a "virtuous cycle" created by the country's tech policies, digital public infrastructure, and vast domestic market. "One thing India has done very uniquely is bring together a virtuous cycle from the policies, the programmes, the technology stack, and the market," he said."It's tremendous to see the private sector fully participate, whether in payments, healthcare, or insurance. It's not about any one thing. That entire stack is magic."He added that with the Sovereign Public Cloud now available in India, organisations could tap into a prescriptive architecture for deploying workloads on Azure, supported by built-in compliance guardrails through Sovereign Landing Zones. This, he said, enabled policy enforcement and provided stronger governance controls.On the company's India investment strategy, he said he was excited about the data centre capacity it was setting up, adding he had discussed the plans with PM Narendra Modi on Tuesday. "We're thrilled about all the data ce-ntre capacity that is coming live. We already have stuff in Pune, Chennai and Mumbai. We are very excited about our India South Central cloud region, based in Hyderabad, that's going to come up next year," Nadella said.
Article Summary: Microsoft ceo satya nadella announced a significant $17.5 billion investment in india over four years, focusing on ai and cloud. He acknowledged india's need for sovereign control and local resilience in technology deployment. The india-born ceo praised what he called a "virtuous cycle" of policies, digital infrastructure, and market.

Article Title: HydroMingle 2025 brings together innovators to address India‚Äôs water challenges
Article Text:
Representative image

HydroMingle 2025, hosted at the India Habitat Centre by GuruJal in partnership with FluxGen Sustainable Technologies, AIM‚ÄìNITI Aayog, AIC‚ÄìIIT Delhi, Sonipat Innovation Foundation, Water Digest, TERI School of Advanced Studies, and several industry collaborators, brought together innovators, policymakers, and experts to explore India‚Äôs water challenges and solutions.The event was attended by Union Minister Rao Inderjit Singh , ministry of planning, who engaged with entrepreneurs and stakeholders working at the intersection of water systems, emerging technologies, and nature-based solutions. The minister highlighted government initiatives such as Jal Shakti Abhiyan, Catch the Rain, Jal Jeevan Abhiyan, and Jal Sanchay Jan Bhagidari Abhiyan, and expressed support for innovations that can scale and are suited to Indian conditions.HydroMingle 2025 functioned as a live innovation hub, combining keynote sessions, panel discussions, technology showcases, and workshops. Participants explored how digital water intelligence, AI-driven monitoring, nature-based models, and community-led approaches can address water management challenges.A key feature of the event was the pitch sessions, where innovators presented solutions including nanobubble technologies, mobile wastewater treatment units, ecological recharge interventions, sensor systems, predictive analytics tools, and AI-based platforms for monitoring groundwater and water infrastructure.These sessions provided real-time feedback from policymakers, financiers, incubators, and experts from organizations such as AIM‚ÄìNiti Aayog, AIC‚ÄìIIT Delhi, Microsoft India, the World Bank, GRIHA Council, TERI SAS, ACWADAM, JSW, and the Embassy of Finland.Speakers at the event emphasized the interconnection between water, food, and energy security in India and highlighted the need for governance reforms, community participation, and rapid deployment of digital technologies. Experts from NIUA, Water Digest, S M Sehgal Foundation, ACWADAM, and other institutions discussed financing models, data-led governance, district-level decision-making systems, and collaborative mechanisms for scaling emerging water technologies.Archana Varma, Mission Director of the National Water Mission, emphasized the importance of community participation and data-driven approaches in managing water at scale and mentioned the launch of a hackathon to identify India-specific digital innovations for water governance.Shubhi Kesarwani, Founder of GuruJal, said the event aimed to bring stakeholders together to facilitate collaborations and partnerships on water solutions. The event also saw participants committing to continued collaboration, citizen science initiatives, and resource-sharing mechanisms to advance water resilience in India.
Article Summary: Hydromingle 2025 brought together innovators, policymakers, and experts to explore india‚Äôs water challenges and solutions. The event was attended by union minister rao inderjit singh, ministry of planning. Participants explored how digital water intelligence, ai-driven monitoring, nature-based models, and community-led approaches can address water management challenges.

Article Title: MLB mock draft: Chicago White Sox strongly linked to $3.6 million ex-Atlanta Braves fireballing lefty at #2
Article Text:
Chicago White Sox in a game (Image via Getty)

Cam Caminiti

Evaluating Cam Caminiti‚Äôs Pitching Profile and Long-Term Upside

Why the Chicago White Sox Are Targeting Cam Caminiti at #2

Cam Caminiti of Atlanta Braves (Image via Getty)

How Caminiti Fits the Chicago White Sox‚Äôs Pitching Development Blueprint

Could Caminiti Challenge for the No. 1 Overall Pick?

What Landing Caminiti Would Mean for the Chicago White Sox‚Äôs Rebuild

Caminiti‚Äôs Rising Momentum as Draft Boards Finalize

As the 2025 MLB Mock Draft conversation intensifies, a Chicago White Sox rumor has zeroed in on one name:, the talented left-handed pitcher from Saguaro High School in Arizona. With the White Sox holding the No. 2 overall pick, league insiders increasingly believe Caminiti has become the franchise‚Äôs preferred selection as draft momentum builds.Cam Caminiti‚Äôs stock continues to soar thanks to a fastball already touching the upper 90s, a sharp swing-and-miss slider, and a highly projectable frame that hints at even more velocity growth. Scouts regularly compare his early profile to past top-10 MLB arms, citing his poise, athleticism, and ability to overpower hitters. His slider frequently earns plus grades, and analysts expect his fastball metrics to climb as he adds strength.Chicago‚Äôs interest aligns perfectly with the organization‚Äôs longstanding blueprint of investing heavily in high-octane left-handers. From Chris Sale to Carlos Rod√≥n to Garrett Crochet, the White Sox have a track record of doubling down on elite pitching traits. Caminiti fits that mold: frontline upside, premium strikeout potential, and significant developmental runway.With Chicago‚Äôs revamped, data-driven pitching infrastructure, evaluators believe the club is well-positioned to maximize Caminiti‚Äôs ceiling.While some MLB teams prefer the dependability of college pitchers, the White Sox appear committed to upside over polish in this draft cycle. Caminiti‚Äôs youth and trajectory give him one of the highest long-term ceilings in the entire class. His delivery, raw stuff, and makeup align with what Chicago now prioritizes under its mechanics-focused development model.There remains mild speculation about whether Caminiti could sneak into contention for the top overall pick, but most insiders expect the Colorado Rockies to target a position player, likely Konnor Griffin. If that holds, Chicago will effectively have the first choice among pitching prospects, placing Caminiti firmly in their sights as the favorite at No. 2.Selecting Caminiti would signal a definitive commitment to rebuilding through elite pitching talent. The White Sox have struggled in recent years to develop sustainable rotation depth, making a potential future ace extremely valuable. Adding a high-octane arm through the 2025 MLB Mock Draft could reshape the organization‚Äôs long-term pitching outlook.Also read: MLB mock draft: Colorado Rockies emerge as favorites for $6,216,600 Pittsburgh Pirates prep star as #1 pick As scouting departments lock in their evaluations, Caminiti‚Äôs connection to Chicago only strengthens. If the White Sox move forward with selecting him at No. 2, they‚Äôd secure one of the most electrifying young pitchers available, an arm capable of shaping the franchise‚Äôs direction for the next decade.
Article Summary: Cam caminiti is a talented left-handed pitcher from saguaro high school in arizona. The chicago white sox hold the no. 2 overall pick in the 2025 mlb mock draft. Chicago‚Äôs interest aligns perfectly with the organization's longstanding blueprint of investing in high-octane left-handers.

Article Title: Anna Kournikova vs Enrique Iglesias net worth in 2025: Tennis star and music icon wealth compared
Article Text:
Anna Kournikova vs Enrique Iglesias net worth in 2025: Tennis star and music icon wealth compared (Image via Getty)

Anna Kournikova net worth in 2025

Anna Kournikova tennis career and endorsements

Enrique Iglesias net worth in 2025

Enrique Iglesias music career and business deals



Anna Kournikova and Enrique Iglesias life in 2025

Anna Kournikova and Enrique Iglesias are one of the richest sports and music couples in the world. In 2025, their money comes from two very different careers. Anna made her wealth mostly from brand deals. Enrique Iglesias earned his money from hit songs, tours, and smart business moves. Together, they remain a powerful and private celebrity couple with strong finances.Anna Kournikova‚Äôs net worth in 2025 is estimated at around 60 million dollars, according to Celebrity Net Worth and Forbes past reports. While she was a top tennis player, her prize money was under 4 million dollars.Most of her wealth came from endorsements, modeling, and media work. Even years after retirement, brands still value her global fame and market reach.Anna Kournikova became famous in the late 1990s. She won two Australian Open doubles titles with Martina Hingis and reached world number one in doubles. Although injuries forced her to retire in 2003, her popularity never faded.She signed big endorsement deals with Adidas, Omega, Berlei, and Lycos. These deals paid far more than tournaments and made her one of the highest-paid female athletes of her era.Enrique Iglesias‚Äô net worth in 2025 stands at about 100 million dollars, based on reports from Celebrity Net Worth and Billboard. He earned his fortune through album sales, global tours, streaming income, and TV appearances.Enrique Iglesias has sold over 180 million records worldwide, making him one of the best-selling Latin artists in history. His music still brings steady income today.For‚Äç‚Äå‚Äç‚Äç‚Äå‚Äç‚Äå‚Äç‚Äç‚Äå close to 30 years, Enrique Iglesias has been active in the music industry. The singer is still making money from live tours, YouTube streams, and various digital platforms.Last year, Enrique Iglesias offloaded a significant part of her music catalog and image rights to a company called Influence Media Partners in a deal of substantial value, which was reported by Billboard. Besides that, He also played a few shows in 2024 and 2025, thus maintaining the flow of his concert ‚Äç ‚Äå ‚Äç ‚Äç‚Äå‚Äç‚Äç‚Äå‚Äç‚Äå‚Äç‚Äç‚Äårevenue.In 2025, Anna Kournikova and Enrique Iglesias continue to live a quiet life in Miami with their three children. Anna keeps a low public profile but is often seen supporting family activities.Enrique Iglesias has said in interviews that family now comes first, even while touring. With a combined net worth close to 160 million dollars, they remain one of the most successful sports and music couples in the world.Also Read: Anna Kournikova and Enrique Iglesias combined net worth in 2025: Tennis career, music earnings, endorsements, business and more
Article Summary: Anna kournikova made her wealth mostly from brand deals. Enrique iglesias earned his money from hit songs, tours, and smart business moves. With a combined net worth close to 160 million dollars, they remain one of the most successful sports and music couples in the world.

Article Title: Starlink price plans for India: Elon Musk-led company may charge Rs 2,500-3,500 per month; check details
Article Text:
The government has not yet assigned spectrum to Starlink for commercial service deployment, and security clearances remain pending.



Starlink‚Äôs India Launch Plans

Starlink's India entry

Elon Musk-led Starlink plans to soon introduce its satellite communication services in India with pricing between Rs 2,500-3,500 for retail customers. The company aims to provide services across multiple sectors including maritime, aviation, retail, and enterprise segments. Earlier, Starlink had briefly displayed pricing of Rs 8,600 monthly on its website, which was subsequently removed. The company later clarified this was due to a technical error.Industry experts considered the initially displayed price point high, suggesting it would have hindered Starlink's competitiveness in India's price-conscious market. Sources told ET that Starlink will announce official pricing after receiving complete regulatory clearances and spectrum allocation from the Department of Telecommunications (DoT).The company has already secured the required Global Mobile Personal Communication by Satellite (GMPCS) licence for retail satellite services. Additionally, it has obtained VSAT licence and permissions for flight and maritime connectivity. These authorisations enable Starlink to deliver satellite-based services across various sectors.Industry experts believe satellite communication will serve as a supplementary service rather than a disruptive force to traditional telecommunications, primarily due to substantial price differences in broadband services.As noted by JM Financial, whilst Reliance Jio and Bharti Airtel offer basic fiber and fixed wireless services at Rs 500 to Rs 1,000 monthly (approximately $6 to $12), Starlink's services are expected to cost three to five times more than these conventional providers.The Indian government has not yet assigned spectrum to Starlink for commercial service deployment, and security clearances remain pending.The firm has recruited leadership personnel for its India operations, including a head executive and financial staff. The India operations and governmental relationships at both national and state levels will remain under the supervision of Lauren Dreyer, who serves as Starlink's vice president, according to informed sources.An industry expert suggests that Starlink's initial strategy for India focuses on establishing a presence rather than immediate profitability. "When the constellation is densified in the coming time, their unit costs will be better. They are coming to India with a long term plan," the expert told ET.He emphasised that Starlink's satellite communication services would not directly rival telecommunications companies due to significant differences in service costs.
Article Summary: Elon musk-led starlink plans to soon introduce its satellite communication services in india. The company aims to provide services across multiple sectors including maritime, aviation, retail, and enterprise segments. The indian government has not yet assigned spectrum to starlink for commercial service deployment, and security clearances remain pending.

Article Title: MLB mock draft: Colorado Rockies emerge as favorites for $6,216,600 Pittsburgh Pirates prep star for #1 pick
Article Text:
Colorado Rockies (Image via USA TODAY Sports)

Konnor Griffin

Colorado Rockies

A Rare Athletic Profile That Separates Konnor Griffin From the Field

Why the Colorado Rockies Are Viewed as the Perfect Fit for Konnor Griffin

Konnor Griffin has already advanced three levels to reach Double-A. (Image Credit: X/@BaseballAmerica)

Colorado‚Äôs Scouting Philosophy Points Toward Griffin

Other Contenders for the Top Pick

The 2025 MLB Mock Draft conversation has intensified as scouting departments finalize early big boards, and one name has separated himself from the rest:, the two-way prep standout widely regarded as the top all-around athlete in this year‚Äôs class. With theholding the No. 1 pick, industry insiders increasingly believe Griffin is the frontrunner to headline the draft.Konnor Griffin, a dynamic outfielder and shortstop from Jackson Prep in Mississippi, has long been considered the highest-upside player eligible in the 2025 MLB Mock Draft cycle. At 6-foot-4 with explosive athleticism, 70-grade speed, and a plus arm, Griffin possesses the type of rare tool set that scouts describe as ‚Äúfranchise-altering.‚Äù His power continues to develop, his defensive versatility is elite, and his makeup consistently draws high marks from evaluators.For the Colorado Rockies, the fit appears seamless. Colorado has frequently targeted premium athletes with advanced projection in recent drafts, and Konnor Griffin embodies that strategy more than any player in the class. His ability to play center field at a high level stands out, particularly in spacious Coors Field, where outfield range is a crucial team-building priority. Offensively, scouts rave about his bat speed and potential to grow into a 20-25 home run threat while maintaining top-tier defensive production.The Colorado Rockies‚Äô scouting approach also aligns with this direction. Since embracing a long-term rebuild, Colorado has shifted focus toward acquiring dynamic athletes capable of impacting the game in multiple phases. Griffin not only checks those boxes but arguably presents the organization with its best opportunity in years to secure a future superstar.Still, the decision will be closely watched. While Konnor Griffin headlines most 2025 MLB Mock Draft boards, college arms such as Brody Brecht and high-upside prep lefties like Cam Caminiti are also under consideration. Yet the overwhelming expectation from insiders is that Griffin offers the safest blend of ceiling and floor, making him the ideal cornerstone for a franchise eager to redefine its competitive trajectory.Also read: MLB mock draft: Chicago White Sox strongly linked to $3.6 million ex-Atlanta Braves fireballing lefty at #2 As the draft approaches, the noise around Konnor Griffin to Colorado continues to grow louder. If projections hold, the Rockies may walk away from the 2025 MLB Draft with one of the most athletic high school prospects of the decade, and a potential franchise face capable of reshaping the team‚Äôs identity for years to come.
Article Summary: Konnor griffin, a dynamic outfielder and shortstop from jackson prep in mississippi, has long been considered the highest-upside player eligible in the 2025 mlb mock draft cycle. At 6-foot-4 with explosive athleticism, 70-grade speed, and a plus arm, griffin possesses the type of rare tool set that scouts describe as ‚Äúfranchise-altering‚Äù

Article Title: IGI's high-tech overhaul: Delhi Airport deploys AI, predictive models & CAT-III upgrades to fight fog disruptions this winter
Article Text:
IGI to fight fog with AI‚Äôs help for smoother ops

NEW DELHI: Delhi Airport has integrated AI systems, advanced predictive analytics and enhanced runway capabilities this winter to reduce the impact of fog on flight operations.A combination of these upgrades and technology should help ensure safer, more efficient flight operations and minimal disruption during low-visibility conditions (LVPs), Delhi International Airport Limited (DIAL), the airport operator, said on Wednesday.The Airport Predictive Operations Centre (APOC), which plays a central role, has integrated real-time data, predictive weather models and airside operational inputs into a single command environment. "It will enable faster decision-making and more accurate resource deployment during fog.It helps optimise runway utilisation, improves gate and stand allocation, prioritises aircraft sequencing, and ensures timely communication with all partners. This coordinated, data-driven approach significantly enhances the airport's ability to maintain operational continuity even during rapid visibility fluctuations," DIAL said.The airport has also completed an airside upgrade in association with the Airports Authority of India (AAI). The Dwarka end of runway 10/28 (the second runway) has now been equipped with a CAT III Instrument Landing System. "With this enhancement, three runways (10/28, 11L/29R, and 11R/29L) at Delhi Airport are now CAT-III compliant at both ends, enabling safe landings even in dense fog. The newly upgraded runway, along with the existing runway, enables around 30 landings per hour during low-visibility conditions," DIAL said.The airside upgrade is expected to cut fog-related recovery time by nearly four hours.Delhi Airport will also use the Winter Fog Experiment (WiFEX) data on fog, which claims to provide 85% prediction accuracy. The Pune-based Indian Institute of Tropical Meteorology (IITM), in collaboration with the India Meteorological Department (IMD) and DIAL, has launched a decade-long collaborative research programme on fog ‚Äî WiFEX."Data related to temperature, humidity, wind profiles, aerosols, pollution particles, radiation, microphysics of fog droplets, and visibility changes are collected through instruments.... This will help in building advanced fog prediction models (1 to 36 hours in advance), understand local meteorology behind dense fog, improve airport operations and safety through accurate visibility forecasts, and create long-term datasets for fog research," DIAL added.Videh Kumar Jaipuriar, CEO-DIAL, said: "While weather-related disruptions cannot be eliminated, these upgrades will greatly improve our ability to plan, respond and recover quickly."
Article Summary: Delhi airport has integrated ai systems, advanced predictive analytics and enhanced runway capabilities this winter. A combination of these upgrades and technology should help ensure safer, more efficient flight operations. The airport has also completed an airside upgrade in association with the airports authority of india (aai)

Article Title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on why despite being the CEO of world's most-valuable company, sense of uncertainty and insecurity doesn't leave him
Article Text:
Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, despite leading his company to a $5 trillion valuation, lives in constant anxiety, a fear rooted in a near-bankruptcy experience. Recent reports of Meta potentially buying Google's AI chips have caused a $250 billion market value drop, validating Huang's long-held belief that the company is always '30 days from going out of business'.

Nvidia Makes History: First Company to Hit $4 Trillion Market Cap

A near-death experience that shaped Huang‚Äôs three decades of paranoia

Why Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang 's fears suddenly look prophetic





Despite leading Nvidia to become the first company ever to hit a $5 trillion valuation, CEO Jensen Huang admits he operates in constant anxiety, working every single day including holidays. His fears may be justified‚Äîthis week alone, Nvidia lost $250 billion in market value after reports emerged that Meta is in advanced talks to buy billions worth of competing chips from Google , threatening the chipmaker's decade-long dominance in AI hardware."The phrase '30 days from going out of business'‚ÄîI've used for 33 years," Huang revealed on The Joe Rogan Experience podcast. "The feeling doesn't change. The sense of vulnerability, the sense of uncertainty, the sense of insecurity‚Äîit doesn't leave you."Huang's anxiety isn't unfounded paranoia‚Äîit's scar tissue from survival. In the mid-1990s, Nvidia discovered fatal flaws in its first graphics chip while developing technology for Sega's gaming console. With funds evaporating, Huang flew to Japan for an excruciating conversation: he told Sega's CEO the product wouldn't work and the deal must end, but simultaneously begged for the final $5 million payment to prevent bankruptcy.Remarkably, Sega converted it into an investment, giving Nvidia the lifeline that eventually built a trillion-dollar empire.That near-collapse experience now fuels Huang's relentless schedule. He wakes at 4 a.m. daily to read "several thousand emails," works seven days a week without exception‚Äî"including Thanksgiving, Christmas"‚Äîand admits he's "always in a state of anxiety." His motivation? "I have a greater drive from not wanting to fail than the drive of wanting to succeed. Failure drives me more than greed."Huang's paranoia might be wisdom. Nvidia made the rare move of issuing a public defense after The Information reported that Meta‚Äîplanning up to $72 billion in AI spending this year‚Äîis negotiating massive purchases of Google's tensor processing units (TPUs). The news triggered a 6% stock plunge, erasing roughly $250 billion in value, while Alphabet shares surged 4%."Nvidia is a generation ahead of the industry‚Äîit's the only platform that runs every AI model," the company declared on X, breaking its usual silence on competitors. But Google's latest Gemini 3 AI model, trained entirely on TPUs rather than Nvidia chips, is being hailed by industry leaders as potentially superior. Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff publicly announced he's switching from ChatGPT after three years, calling Gemini 3 the better product.The threat is existential to Nvidia's 90% market share in AI accelerators. If Google captures even a fraction of the hundreds of billions being spent on AI processors‚Äîparticularly from customers like Meta‚Äîit would represent the first serious crack in Nvidia's dominance.Huang's work ethic has infected his family: both his children, Madison and Spencer, now in their thirties, work at Nvidia after joining as interns in 2020 and 2022. "Now we have three people working every day," Huang said.For a CEO who never stopped running scared despite building a $4.5-trillion empire, the market turmoil caused by Google likely only confirmed what he's believed for 33 years: you're always 30 days from going out of business.
Article Summary: Jensen huang is the ceo of nvidia, the first company ever to hit a $5 trillion valuation. He wakes at 4 a.m. daily to read "several thousand emails," works seven days a week without exception, including holidays. Recent reports of meta potentially buying google's ai chips have caused a $250 billion market value drop.

Article Title: After losing more than $70 billion, Mark Zuckerberg seems to have finally admitted that his biggest bet is 'not working'
Article Text:
$70 billion in losses and counting

Layoffs may be coming to Meta

Meta‚Äôs Secret AI Army: Top Talent Hired from OpenAI, Google & More







Where Metaverse budget cuts may go

Wall Street says: We are with you on this

Meta reportedly delays MR glasses

The day Facebook changed its name to Meta





Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg seems to have finally realised that one of the company's biggest bets‚ÄîMetaverse‚Äîis not working (or not working as expected). It is also the technology that the company changed its very name after. In 2021, after 17 years of being called Facebook, the social networking parent company behind Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and Oculus changed its name to Meta. Now according to a report from Bloomberg, Meta is likely to slash its Reality Labs budget, shaving off as much as 30%. The proposed metaverse cuts are reportedly part of the company's annual budget planning for 2026, which included a series of meetings at Zuckerberg's compound in Hawaii last month.For those unaware, Metaverse unit works on virtual reality headsets and a VR-based social network, which produces the company's Quest mixed-reality headsets, smart glasses made with EssilorLuxottica's Ray-Ban and upcoming augmented-reality glasses. Meta has struggled to sell its vision of an immersive metaverse of interconnected virtual worlds and expand the market for its devices beyond the niche of the gaming community.Analysts see the move reflecting the overall lack of interest in products like Meta‚Äôs social virtual reality platform Horizon Worlds, as well as its virtual reality hardware‚Äîboth in the industry at large, as well as among consumers.Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs Metaverse vision has posted more than $70 billion in losses over the past four years. Little doubt then that Facebook parent's shares rose 4% as the move eased some investor jitters over a bet that CEO Mark Zuckerberg has backed with billions of dollars. "Smart move, just late," told Huber Research Partners analyst Craig Huber to Bloomberg. He added, "This seems a major shift to align costs with a revenue outlook that surely is not as prosperous as management thought years ago. "So, what may really be troubling Metaverse? No one can really pinpoint. But as a report in Fortune says, for many people, the problem is that the value proposition is unclear; Metaverse simply doesn‚Äôt yet deliver a must-have reason to ditch their smartphones or laptops.Reality Labs is made up of a Metaverse unit and a wearables unit. Within the Metaverse unit, executives are reportedly considering making cuts to VR jobs. As the report says, cuts in resources that high are most likely to include layoffs as early as January.The report comes as Meta scrambles to stay relevant in Silicon Valley's artificial-intelligence race after its Llama 4 model met with a poor reception. To fuel its ambitious goals, Meta has committed as much as $72 billion in capital spending this year. The company reorganized its AI efforts under Superintelligence Labs earlier this year, with Zuckerberg said to be personally leading an aggressive talent acquisition, floating offers for startups and directly courting prospects on WhatsApp with million-dollar pay packages. In fact, Meta's big hiring is said to have triggered a talent war in the Silicon Valley.Last month, Meta Platforms said that it will invest $600 billion in the US infrastructure and jobs over the next three years, including artificial intelligence data centers. Meta has doubled down on AI, with a target of achieving superintelligence. Zuckerberg said Meta is building compute because "it's the right strategy to aggressively front-load capacity so we're prepared for the most optimistic cases," on the company's recent earnings call. Meta has forecast "notably larger" capital expenses next year thanks to investments in artificial intelligence, including aggressively building data centers to power its AI push.Incidentally, earlier this week, Zuckerberg announced that Alan Dye, a longtime designer at Apple, is joining Meta to lead a new creative studio inside the Reality Labs division that would focus on design, fashion and technology. Dye will report to Andrew Bosworth, Meta‚Äôs chief technology officer, who leads Reality Labs. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre entering a new era where A.I. glasses and other devices will change how we connect with technology and each other,‚Äù Mr. Zuckerberg said in a post to Threads. ‚ÄúWith this new studio, we‚Äôre focused on making every interaction thoughtful, intuitive, and built to serve people.‚ÄùWall Street sent a clear signal to Meta Platforms that it wants the company to reduce spending on Reality Labs. Wall Street is sending a clear signal to Meta Platforms that it wants the company to reduce spending on Reality Labs. Meta Platforms shares jumped 3.4% on reports that the company was cutting Metaverse spending in favor of AI and smart glasses.Meta has reportedly delayed the launch of its Mixed Reality Glasses (MR Glasses) from the second half of 2026 to the first half of 2027. According to a report in Business Insider, Meta executives announced the delay after meetings with CEO Mark Zuckerberg is said to have told the team to take more time to make the business sustainable and deliver higher quality experiences. The company‚Äôs Metaverse leaders Gabriel Aul and Ryan Cairns reportedly told team that the delay is ‚Äúgoing to give us a lot more breathing room to get the details right. ‚ÄùFacebook already sells VR headsets and Ray-Ban smart glasses. The form factor of Meta's upcoming Glasses will reportedly be similar to that of Apple Vision Pro, with may be more power.In October 2021, after 17 years of being called Facebook, the social networking giant behind Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and Oculus got a new name. Facebook‚Äôs corporate entity became Meta. Mark Zuckerberg announced the change at the company‚Äôs AR/VR-focused Connect event, sharing that the new title captured more of the company‚Äôs core ambition: to build the metaverse. Analysts saw name change as the right move, as Instagram was -- and continues to be -- more valuable than Facebook. Along with WhatsApp and Messenger, the four apps are known as Meta's Family of Apps
Article Summary: Reality labs, meta's virtual reality unit, is likely to be cut by as much as 30%. The cuts are reportedly part of the company's annual budget planning for 2026. Analysts see the move reflecting the overall lack of interest in products like meta‚Äôs social virtual reality platform.

Article Title: PlayStation 2025 Wrap-Up now live: Here‚Äôs how to check your PS gaming report card
Article Text:
PlayStation gamers can now dive into their 2025 Wrap-Up, revealing total hours played and top games. This annual recap, live until January 8, 2026, offers detailed insights into gaming habits, including genre preferences and trophy achievements. Players can also earn a free avatar and shareable cards. While some miss past detailed breakdowns, the experience highlights popular titles and upcoming blockbusters.

Your PlayStation gaming year by the numbers





PlayStation gamers can now access their personalized 2025 Wrap-Up statistics, revealing exactly how many hours they spent gaming this year and which titles dominated their playtime.The annual recap went live December 9 and runs through January 8, 2026, offering PS5 and PS4 players detailed breakdowns of their gaming habits. To qualify, users must have played at least 10 hours between January 1 and December 31, 2025, and enabled data collection on their consoles.The Wrap-Up delivers comprehensive statistics including top games and genres, single-player versus multiplayer hours, trophy achievements, and PlayStation Plus membership details. This year's edition also tracks accessory usage‚Äîshowing time spent with PlayStation VR2, PlayStation Portal, and preferred DualSense controller designs.Players completing the experience earn a free glass-themed avatar and can download shareable summary cards showcasing their year in gaming. The dashboard continues updating through December 31, making a return visit before the January deadline worthwhile for complete statistics.Hit titles like Ghost of Y≈çtei, Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 topped many players' most-played lists. However, some longtime users report this year's Wrap-Up feels lighter on details compared to previous versions, notably missing the month-by-month breakdowns that made earlier editions more engaging.The recap mirrors similar year-end traditions from Spotify and other platforms, transforming raw data into shareable moments. With blockbusters like Grand Theft Auto 6 and Resident Evil Requiem scheduled for 2026, next year's statistics promise even more dramatic gaming tallies.Visit wrapup.playstation.com to check your 2025 PlayStation report card before the January 8 deadline.
Article Summary: Playstation gamers can now dive into their 2025 wrap-up, revealing total hours played and top games. This annual recap, live until january 8, 2026, offers detailed insights into gaming habits. Players can also earn a free avatar and shareable cards.

Article Title: Phoebe Gates gets $30 million for Phia, that made father Bill Gates say: When your daughter asks if you‚Äôd be willing to work a shift in ‚Ä¶
Article Text:
‚ÄúI‚Äôve entered the startup world again‚Ä¶When your daughter asks if you‚Äôd be willing to work a shift in customer service at her startup, the only right answer is yes.

I‚Äôve spent a lot of time thinking about how technology can make systems more efficient, equitable, and accessible.

But I‚Äôve learned over the years that the best way to understand how something works, or where it breaks, is to go straight to the people using it.

That‚Äôs why I‚Äôll be joining the Phia customer experience team for a day this week. Phia is a fashion-tech tool built to make shopping smarter and more sustainable, and it‚Äôs the brainchild of my daughter Phoebe Gates and her co-founder

Sophia Kianni

.

They‚Äôve built an app and browser extension that helps people shop smarter by finding the best prices, surfacing secondhand options, and showing lower-impact alternatives across thousands of online retailers.

It‚Äôs been inspiring to watch them tackle a massive challenge, rethinking the way we shop, by meeting users where they are.

And now, I‚Äôll be doing the same.

Looking forward to getting back into the startup scene. Hopefully, I won‚Äôt break anything (no promises).

üì≤Download the Phia iOS app for free at join.phia.com

üíªOr if you shop on your computer like me, they have a free chrome extension at gophia.com

Let me know what you think! You never know who‚Äôs on the other end of the customer service line‚Ä¶‚Äù

How the latest funding round will help Phoebe Gates Phia app





Microsoft founder Bill Gates ' daughter Phoebe Gates has raised $30 million funding for her artificial intelligence (AI) shopping startup, Phia. The new funding values the company at $180 million. However, Phoebe Gates‚Äô father has yet to invested in the venture. Instead, the Bill Gates donated his time and experience to her daughter‚Äôs startup. Earlier this year, the tech billionaire took to professional networking site LinkedIn to announce that he was doing a customer service shift to support the team in the days following the launch of the app. He said when a daughter asks for help at her startup, the only right answer is yes.In his LinkedIn post, Bill Gates shared a short clip offering a glimpse of his shift working in the customer service department of his daughter‚Äôs app. He wrote:The latest round of funding is a massive leap in value for Phoebe Gates' startup, coming just months after the New York-based company finished its first fundraising round. It will make the startup one of the most-watched companies in the booming AI market.The company has attracted a long list of famous backers. According to a pitch deck viewed by Bloomberg, investors include Hailey Bieber, Kris Jenner, Sheryl Sandberg, and Spanx founder Sara Blakely.Phia has been designed to serve as an intelligent shopping assistant. Its being offered as an AI agent that will fix the messy online shopping experience. According to the company, customers usually struggle to find what they want and companies end up advertising to people who aren‚Äôt interested and Phia will be able to resolve it.As a computer and mobile phone browser extension, Phia searches for products, price comparisons, and real-time discounts to help users in their buying decisions. Second-hand options are also highlighted by Phia to further assist people in shopping more 'green'.The new financial round is being led by major investment firms, including Notable Capital, Kleiner Perkins, and Khosla Ventures; investors with a history of supporting giants in the tech sector, such as Airbnb.Phia says it was downloaded 750,000 times in just eight months. The idea by Phoebe Gates and her co-founder Sophia Kianni was born while living in a Stanford dorm room; the initial plans were to make a smart tampon but later changed to fashion technology.A $250,000 grant from a Stanford social entrepreneurship program enabled them to work on the project full time and eventually move to New York. Kianni also took a break from her studies so that she could quickly learn everything about the industry they were going to work in, she told Vogue.Earlier, Phoebe Gates told Elle that when she first floated the idea to her parents, Bill and Melinda Gates, they urged her to treat it as a side project. She followed their advice by joining Stanford's night program after relocating to New York and completing her degree in 2024.
Article Summary: Microsoft founder bill gates'daughter phoebe gates has raised $30 million funding for her artificial intelligence (ai) shopping startup, phia. Earlier this year, the tech billionaire took to professional networking site linkedin to announce that he was doing a customer service shift to support the team in the days following the launch of the app.

Article Title: NYT Connections today‚Äôs hints and answers (#913) for 10 December 2025
Article Text:
What is NYT Connections





NYT Connections: Hints for today‚Äôs puzzle



Yellow Group: Surprised expression

Green Group: Unreal

Blue Group: A treat

Purple Group: The letter after X

NYT Connections categories for December 10, 2025



Yellow Group: Words you might say in surprise or shock.

Green Group: Words related to imitation or copying.

Blue Group: Words for sweet treats or candies.

Purple Group: Words that start with the letter Y.

NYT Connections answers for December 10, 2025

Yellow Group: DEAR, GRACIOUS, HEAVENS, MERCY

Green Group: COPY, DUMMY, DUPE, FAKE

Blue Group: CANDY, LOLLY, SUCKER, SWEET

Purple Group: WHY, YEAR, YELLOW, YES

NYT Connections related FAQs



How do I play the game?

Are hints available?

Can I play NYT Connections for free?

What skills does the game improve?





The New York Times‚Äô Connections has quickly become a favourite among word puzzle enthusiasts, blending the addictive simplicity of Wordle with more complex challenges in logic and pattern recognition. Each day, players face 16 seemingly random words arranged in a 4x4 grid, tasked with sorting them into four distinct thematic groups. Success depends on identifying subtle connections, associations, and clever wordplay, making the game both fun and mentally stimulating. For puzzle lovers looking to test their skills, the December 10, 2025 edition (game #913) offers an ideal mix of challenge and insight, encouraging lateral thinking, careful observation, and strategic reasoning. Connections continues to captivate a global audience as a daily exercise in cognitive skill and mental agility.NYT Connections is a captivating word association game designed to test analytical thinking, lateral reasoning, and cognitive flexibility. Unlike standard word games, players must detect subtle links between words, which can range from obvious to highly nuanced or abstract. The game is freely available on mobile devices and desktop platforms, allowing enthusiasts to play anytime, anywhere, at their convenience.Its combination of easy-to-understand mechanics, challenging puzzles, and complex problem-solving has turned it into a daily ritual for many. The game‚Äôs structure encourages players to sharpen their pattern recognition, develop strategic thinking, improve memory retention, and enjoy a mental workout while having fun.To assist players without giving away the answers directly, here are strategic hints for December 10, 2025:These hints guide players toward recognising patterns, encouraging logical deduction and strategic grouping without removing the challenge entirely.Check below the today's NYT Connections categories to solve the puzzle:For those ready to review their solutions or learn from the puzzle logic, the complete answers for game #913 are:Connections continues to captivate players worldwide, turning each puzzle into a thrilling hunt for hidden patterns, where every correct grouping sparks a moment of ‚Äúaha!‚Äù and keeps the mind sharp for the next challenge.Words are presented in a 4x4 grid. Identify patterns or associations to sort them into four correct categories.Yes, the game provides subtle hints to guide players without revealing the answers outright.Yes, it is available for free on both mobile devices and desktop platforms.It sharpens pattern recognition, logical thinking, lateral reasoning, and problem-solving skills.
Article Summary: Connections is a captivating word association game designed to test analytical thinking, lateral reasoning, and cognitive flexibility. Unlike standard word games, players must detect subtle links between words, which can range from obvious to highly nuanced or abstract.

Article Title: TCS Layoffs: Maharashtra labour minister Aakash Fundkar gives written reply in Vidhan Parishad on TCS layoffs
Article Text:
TCS layoffs: Legislative concerns

TCS HR chief Sudeep Kunnumal on layoffs in future





Maharashtra labour minister Aakash Fundkar has now informed that the state legislative council that around 376 employees of Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) were laid off at the company‚Äôs Pune campuses over the past two quarters of the current fiscal year. The disclosure was made via a hand written reply during the Vidhan Parishad session, after concerns were raised by members over reports of widespread layoffs in the IT sector.Fundkar further clarified that the layoffs were not linked to artificial intelligence or automation, addressing speculation that job losses were part of a broader restructuring driven by new technologies. In the Vidhan Parishad, Fundkar revealed that the company fired 376 employees from its Pune campus and the round of layoffs mainly impacted middle and senior-level managers.As reported by new agency PTI, during the Question Hour, the legislators including Uma Khare and Prasad Lad raised questions about increasing job losses in the technology sector and the impact of AI adoption on employment. The reply by the minister is sought to provide transparency by citing official data received directly from TCS.The Maharashtra government also stressed in the fact that while the layoffs have occurred, they are not on the scale suggested by media reports of mass layoffs across multiple cities.The minister further assured the council that the government is monitoring developments in the IT sector closely, given its importance to employment and state‚Äôs economy.Recently, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) HR head Sudeep Kunnumal recently addressed concerns over potential layoffs at the IT giant. Speaking during the company‚Äôs Q2 earnings call earlier this month, Kunnumal said that TCS is not ‚Äúchasing a target‚Äù when it comes to job cuts. Instead, the IT firm said it will evaluate ‚Äúeveryone‚Äù.During the earnings call, analyst Surendra Goyal from Citi asked: ‚ÄúThe (second) question is with the release of 1% workforce, the headcount declined by 20,000 people or 3%. And what you had announced earlier was 2%. So should we expect a similar kind of head count reduction in the next quarter as well?‚ÄùTCS HR head Sudeep Kunnumal replied to the question saying: ‚ÄúSo almost -- see, the 20,000 head count is a factor of voluntary and involuntary attrition. So you should see that. But as we announced, against the 2 percentage, we have midway, so we have done approximately 1 percentage of it. And like what Krithi just mentioned, we don't have a target.‚Äù
Article Summary: Around 376 employees of tata consultancy services (tcs) were laid off at the company‚Äôs pune campuses over the past two quarters of the current fiscal year. The disclosure was made via a hand written reply during the vidhan parishad session.

Article Title: Hinge CEO Justin McLeod exits to launch AI dating app Overtone
Article Text:
Leadership transition at Hinge

Launch of Overtone





Hinge founder and CEO Justin McLeod has announced that he is stepping down from his position and will launch a new venture ‚Äî Overtone. McLeod revealed that Overtone is an AI-driven dating platform spun out of the Match Group. As part of the transition, Jackie Jantos, currently Hinge's president and chief marketing officer, has been promoted to chief executive officer. McLeod, who founded Hinge in 2011, will remain an advisor to Hinge through March to support the transition. Match Group will continue to invest in Hinge's momentum and in Overtone's development as part of its strategy to shape the future of the category through responsible AI and real-world outcomes.As CEO, Jackie Jantos will lead Hinge into its next phase of growth, building on four years of leadership across brand, culture, and product strategy. Under her tenure as President and CMO, Hinge expanded into Europe and Latin America, introduced new product innovations rooted in user insights, and strengthened its cultural relevance with Gen Z, which now represents Hinge's largest audience globally."Justin has been an extraordinary innovator and world-class founder, taking Hinge from an early idea to a global leader in intentional dating," said Spencer Rascoff, CEO of Match Group."We're proud to have incubated Overtone within Hinge and to now lead its funding round as he builds his next venture. With a strong foundation and leadership team in place, Hinge is poised for its next chapter under Jackie's leadership, focused on continued growth and innovation. ""Building Hinge has been the privilege of my life, and I'm incredibly proud of what the team has created," said McLeod. "The company's momentum, including being on track to reach $1 billion in revenue by 2027, gives me full confidence in where Hinge is headed. I'm grateful for Spencer and Match Group's continued support and excited for what comes next."McLeod revealed that his new company ‚Äî Overtone will work independently but will get strategic support from Match Group. The dating app is said to useAI-powered personalization to improve matchmaking, focusing on deeper compatibility and conversational chemistry rather than surface-level swipes.According to McLeod, Overtone will use advanced AI to help users craft more authentic profiles and generate meaningful introductions. The platform is designed to reduce the friction of online dating by offering smarter suggestions and context-aware interactions.Match Group plans to lead Overtone's initial funding round in early 2026 and hold a substantial ownership position.
Article Summary: Hinge founder and ceo justin mcleod has announced that he is stepping down from his position and will launch a new venture ‚Äî overtone. Overtone is an ai-driven dating platform spun out of the match group. Mcleod, who founded hinge in 2011, will remain an advisor to hinge through march to support the transition.

Article Title: Sam Altman says industry is wrong on OpenAI's competition, it is not from Google, but ...
Article Text: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has declared Apple its ultimate rival, shifting focus from AGI to device-centric AI. A 'code red' memo halts moonshot projects to boost ChatGPT's performance, driven by aggressive talent raids from Apple. Meanwhile, Google's Gemini surges, forcing OpenAI to prioritize mass-market appeal and user feedback to regain dominance.
Article Summary: Openai ceo sam altman has declared apple its ultimate rival, shifting focus from agi to device-centric ai. A 'code red' memo halts moonshot projects to boost chatgpt's performance. Meanwhile, google's gemini surges, forcing openai to prioritize mass-market appeal and user feedback to regain dominance.

Article Title: When does RaKai‚Äôs Twitch ban officially end? Ray reveals the official timeline of his fellow streamer‚Äôs suspension
Article Text:
Twitch streamer RaKai's ban will end on January 1, 2026. Fellow streamer Ray received a warning from Twitch for attempting to feature RaKai. This comes after RaKai's suspension for alleged illegal activities. RaKai also faced backlash for insulting another streamer. He is currently offline and offline. His return date is set.

Ray reveals Twitch warning and explains why RaKai cannot appear on streams until the ban lifts





The uncertainty surrounding RaKai‚Äôs sudden Twitch suspension has finally started to settle after fellow streamer Ray, known online as ‚Äúrayasianboy‚Äù, revealed the updated timeline for the ban. RaKai, one of the fastest-rising young faces on the platform at just 16 years old, was abruptly suspended on December 2, 2025.The reason, according to RaKai himself, was tied to ‚Äúillegal activities,‚Äù though he did not elaborate. Confusion escalated when his dashboard initially showed a two-year ban. Twitch later stated this was simply a ‚Äúvisual bug,‚Äù leaving fans waiting for clarity. Now, Ray‚Äôs latest update has provided the clearest picture so far, confirming that RaKai will remain off Twitch until January 1, 2026.During a December 9 livestream, Ray told viewers that Twitch officially informed him that RaKai‚Äôs suspension ends on January 1, effectively ruling out any collaborations until then.He explained the situation bluntly: ‚ÄúYeah, chat, RaKai got banned until January 1st. We cannot do st with RaKai until January 1st. He‚Äôs going to be grounded‚Ä¶ he cannot pop out on stream‚Ä¶ because I got an email from Twitch. Chat, I got an email from Twitch.Okay? It‚Äôs over, bro.‚Äù**Ray then pulled up the email he received from Twitch, showing that the platform had issued him a warning for ‚Äúaiding account suspension evasion.‚Äù The message reminded him of Twitch‚Äôs policies and reinforced that even indirect attempts to feature a banned creator could trigger disciplinary action.Meanwhile, RaKai has been dealing with additional backlash. On the same day as Ray‚Äôs update, the young streamer posted a video of his mother scolding him for calling fellow streamer QTCinderella an ‚Äúugly bch‚Äù following her joke at The Streamer Awards 2025. In the clip, she reprimanded him, saying: ‚ÄúThat is not how you talk to women‚Ä¶ I raised you way better than that‚Ä¶ your a is coming home.‚ÄùThe combination of disciplinary action, public criticism, and parental intervention has left RaKai sidelined both online and offline. As of now, he has not commented further on his upcoming return, though January 1, 2026, marks the next opportunity for him to reenter the Twitch community, with a spotlight brighter than ever.Also Read: ‚ÄúDo some horrible things to her‚Äù: Disturbing assault threats against streamer Fanfan reported at The Streamer Awards 2025
Article Summary: Twitch streamer rakai's ban will end on january 1, 2026. Fellow streamer ray received a warning from twitch for attempting to feature him. This comes after rakai's suspension for alleged illegal activities. He is currently offline and offline. His return date is set.

Article Title: 'Please do not...': Stranded Indian H-1B's request on Reddit goes viral amid visa chaos
Article Text:
Major fallout of visa appointment cancelations in India

Social media vetting of H-1B candidates will begin on December 15. Consular offices in Hyderabad and Chennai process hundreds of visa appointments every day.

The administration announced that they need to reduce the number per day as officers will now have to vet the social media accounts of every candidate and so it will take time.

Appointments of mid-December were canceled and rescheduled to March 2026, at the earliest.

Visa stamping is done in the home country, according to a new rule. So a number of H-1B candidates took their appointments in India and flew home, coinciding with the holiday season in the US.

Days before their scheduled appointments, they got to know that those dates have been deferred to March, April, May etc.

Many H-1B visa holders won't be able to enter the US without the stamping. So they have no other option than to remain stuck in India waiting for their appointment date in 2026.

H-1B candidates, according to lawyers, can be allowed to work from India but that also depends on their employers. And many are scared that they will lose their jobs.

Lawyers have advised that those who are in the US and thinking of taking an appointment for visa stamping should not leave the country as the situation is volatile, and leaving the country now means they would not be able to be back for at least six months.

A Reddit post went viral as the Redditor urged Indians in the US who have their appointments in India in January, February to cancel those appointments so that some dates free up and those who are stuck in India can possibly get an early chance.

Many H-1B candidates in the US responded to the post saying that this could become the only solution to the visa mess now in India and many said they already canceled their dates in December, January and February.

US To Block Moderators And Fact-Checkers As 'Censors', Massive Uncertainty For Indian Applicants





As hundreds of H-1B visa holders have been left with no other option other than biding their time in India as the US State Department canceled maximum visa appointments of December and rescheduled them to March 2026, a request from a Redditor has gone viral. The Redditor urged fellow Indians who are in the US to cancel their appointments for January or February so that those who are stuck in India get an early chance for their visa appointments. The request resonated with many on social media as the unprecedented decision from the US administration even left immigration attorneys confused as they don't know what should be done in the present situation.
Article Summary: Social media vetting of h-1b candidates will begin on december 15. Appointments of mid-december were canceled and rescheduled to march 2026. A reddit post went viral as the redditor urged indians in the us who have their appointments in india in january, february to cancel those appointments.
